categories: Category:Star Wars Insider Special Edition 2016 articles

nodes.text: In Pursuit of Perfection is an interview with Duwayne Dunham about "Pursuit of Peace" and "Water War," two episodes he directed for the TV series Star Wars: The Clone Wars.
This article was written by J. W. Rinzler and published in Star Wars Insider 133. It was later reprinted in Star Wars Insider Special Edition 2016.
